name: Jared Moskowitz

issues.title: COVID-19 Response
issues.description: Advocated for aggressive pandemic management and vaccination efforts as Florida Emergency Management Director
issues.source: Florida Division of Emergency Management official records

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Strong supporter of gun safety legislation, particularly after Parkland shooting, advocating for background checks and assault weapon restrictions

issues.title: Environmental Protection
issues.description: Supports climate change mitigation, coastal restoration, and reducing environmental impacts in Florida

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding Medicaid, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and reducing healthcare costs

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased teacher salaries, school infrastructure improvements, and expanded educational resources

issues.title: Economic Development
issues.description: Supports small business incentives, workforce training programs, and infrastructure investment
issues.source: Florida House economic development committee records

issues.title: LGBTQ+ Rights
issues.description: Supports anti-discrimination protections, marriage equality, and opposing restrictive legislation targeting LGBTQ+ communities

sources: Florida House of Representatives Official Website
